name: Mightiest Minion
description:
Are you the Mightiest Minion? The village is under attack! You must defend it with the tools at your disposal, bombs and your body. Stop the enemies from reaching the end and save your village in this Tower Defense derivative. Controls:  LeftLeft Arrow or A
UpUp Arrow or W
RightRight Arrow or D
DownDown Arrow or S
JumpSpacebar or Shift
RestartR
*You will automatically place bombs

This game was in 48 hours for Ludum Dare Jam 50 with the theme "Delay the inevitable"

This game was also made for Minijam 103 with the theme "Darkness" and limitation "You are your own worst enemy"

All assets are original. Source code and music available in the download.

LD50 entry link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/mightiest-minion
